entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: Professor Slughorn is introduced as a character who enters the scene and interacts with Harry. He is described as thinking that Harry's hex was 'a really good hex'.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who cast the hex on someone, and later he has an idea to enter the Slytherin compartment unseen.

entities.name: zabini
entities.description: Zabini is introduced as a character who is part of the Slytherin sixth-year compartment.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as someone who will be sitting in the Slytherin compartment and thinking himself unheard by anyone except fellow Slytherins.

entities.name: hogsmeade station
entities.description: Hogsmeade station is mentioned as a location where Harry and his friends are on their way to.

relationships.description: Slughorn invited Harry to lunch after seeing him cast a hex.
Zabini and Malfoy are part of the same compartment, with Zabini re-entering it.
Harry plans to enter the Slytherin compartment unseen behind Zabini.
